ygData.subject: Re: Wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: The Root spell can be found in the great city of Halas friend, at the Shaman s Guild. Travis I am on the look out for the Root spell my friends of Norrath.  I
ygData.messageBody:
The Root spell can be found in the great city of Halas friend, at the
Shaman's Guild.

Travis




I am on the look out for the Root spell my friends of Norrath. I have
travel
far from Erudin in my search yet have been unable to locate it. I have gone
as
far a Rivervale looking for this spell of great legacy. Does anybody know
of
its whereabouts? It would be greatly appreciated if any creature could let
me
know.

Zakrul the Traveler
Companion
Erudite Wizard

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
